titleStmt.title: Three godly treatises [brace] 1. To comfort the sicke, 2. Against the feare of death, 3. Of the resurrection [brace] / written in French by Mr. I.D. L'Espine, preacher of the word of God in Angers ; and translated into English by S. Veghelman.
titleStmt.author: L'Espine, Jean de, ca. 1506-1597.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Richard Banckworth, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard at the Signe of the Sunne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Magdalene College (University of Cambridge). Library.
